name: Little Birb's Big Adventure
description:
Help little birb reach his family in this short platform game! Created in three weeks for Great Spring Game Jam 2021.

How to play:

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Gamepads supported (if you have one plugged in)
  • Get stuck? Press Shift+Y to skip the level

Credits:

  • Development and design by pawprints
  • Art and animation by helpcomputer
  • Music and sound effects by human pyramids
  • Font: Kalopsia by DamienG
